description: This table contains information about bundled episodes. A bundled episode is used to link related encounters and services that can be billed together using a pre-defined agreement with a payor or guarantor.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bundled episode record.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the coverage that will be billed for the bundled episode.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the payer responsible for the bundled episode's expected payment.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the guarantor is responsible for the bundled episode's expected payment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: BPC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bundled episode terms associated with the bundled episode. The terms are used to define various reimbursement related attributes for a bundled episode.

columns.name: BPC_ID_BPC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bundled episode terms record.

columns.name: BPC_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the bundled episode terms associated with the bundled episode. The terms are used to define various reimbursement related attributes for a bundled episode.

columns.name: BILLING_START_DT
columns.description: The start date from which the services are covered in the bundled episode.

columns.name: BILLING_END_DT
columns.description: The end date until which the services are covered in the bundled episode.

columns.name: EXP_TOTAL_PMT
columns.description: The amount of the total expected payment/target price from the responsible party of a bundled episode.

columns.name: EXP_HOSP_PMT
columns.description: The amount of the total hospital expected payment from the responsible party of a bundled episode.

columns.name: EXP_PROF_PMT
columns.description: The amount of the total professional expected payment from the responsible party of a bundled episode. This will only be used when a separate  professional payment is expected.

columns.name: MAIN_EVENT_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the patient encounter that is the main encounter for this bundled episode.

columns.name: MAIN_EVENT_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who set the main event for this bundled episode.

columns.name: MAIN_EVENT_SET_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the main event was last set for this bundled episode.

columns.name: CLOSE_OR_VOID_DATE
columns.description: The closed or voided date of the bundled episode.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_VOID_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the reason why a bundled episode is voided.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Created In Error


Voided By System

columns.name: LAST_LINK_UNLINK_DATE
columns.description: The most recent date when a record was either linked or unlinked from the bundled episode. This will be updated when a hospital transaction, professional transaction, or hospital billing account is linked or unlinked.

columns.name: LAST_ORIG_PMT_DATE
columns.description: The most recent date when a global payment or refund was posted on the anchor hospital account.

columns.name: LAST_BILL_LINK_UNLINK_DT
columns.description: The most recent date when a record was either linked or unlinked from the bundled episode within the date range of a non-tracking phase. This will be updated when a hospital transaction, professional transaction, or hospital billing account is linked or unlinked.
